backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all CRM data types (Lead, Deal, Customer, Reminder, SolarProject, etc.), actor state (maps and counters), and integrating access control, user approval, and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines the canonical State type for all backend data and provides a no-op migration function that passes state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented feature IDs (sidebar visibility fixes, dashboard real data, pipeline real data, functional action buttons, etc.) to their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key behaviors of pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, sidebar, chart, and destructive colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the VCRM React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route tree with public (login) and protected (layout-wrapped) routes for all CRM pages, wrapped in QueryClient and ThemeProvider providers.
frontend/src/components/AddLeadModal.tsx: A modal dialog for quickly adding a new lead with name, phone (required), and email fields, using the useAddLead mutation and showing toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/components/CustomerFormDial: A dialog form for adding or editing a customer (name, email, phone, address, coordinates), but currently shows an info toast and closes without performing any backend operation.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: A card component displaying a deal's title, customer name, and value, with a dropdown menu for editing, deleting, or moving the deal to another pipeline stage.
frontend/src/components/DealFormDialog.t: A dialog form for creating or editing a deal with title, value, lead/contact selector, and stage fields, using useAddDeal and useUpdateDeal mutations.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmati: A reusable alert dialog that prompts the user to confirm deletion of a named entity, with a loading spinner state and destructive-styled confirm button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main application shell with a responsive sidebar navigation (including nested 'Other Services' items), sign-out logic, and a profile setup modal trigger for users without a configured profile.
frontend/src/components/LeadFormDialog.t: A dialog form for creating or editing a lead with name, contact, status (select), and notes fields, using useAddLead and useUpdateLead mutations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for setting up a user profile with name, email, and phone fields, including client-side validation, categorized error handling, and a mutation hook to save the profile to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ReminderFormDial: A dialog form for adding or editing a reminder with due date and note fields; submission is stubbed out with a toast notification indicating reminders are unavailable in this version.
frontend/src/components/SolarProjectForm: A dialog form for creating or editing a solar project (system size, surveyor name, survey notes); submission is stubbed out with a toast notification indicating the feature is unavailable.
A purely visual map widget that renders a styled SVG grid with continent shapes and a pin marker positioned from latitude/longitude coordinates, with no external map API dependency.
frontend/src/components/UploadExcelSheet: A UI-only modal for uploading Excel/CSV files via drag-and-drop or file browse, with all interactions stubbed to show a toast notification indicating no actual processing occurs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to the React component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, OTP auth, leads, deals, and admin approval operations using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including colors, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Full-page error component shown when a user lacks permission, with a button to navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page that lists users by approval status (pending/approved/rejected) and allows a super admin to approve or reject them via tabbed UI.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Leads/contacts management page with search, add, edit, and delete functionality backed by backend query hooks and displayed in a card grid.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDetailPage.ts: Placeholder detail page for a single customer showing contact info fields, with a note that customer management is unavailable in this version.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Local-state customers list page with search, add, edit, delete, and view navigation, using a card grid layout without backend persistence.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays a CRM dashboard with summary stat cards (total leads, deals, won deals, revenue) and Recharts bar/pie charts showing deals by stage and leads by status.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPage.tsx: Renders a Kanban-style sales pipeline board with four deal stages, supporting add/edit/delete deals and moving deals between stages.
frontend/src/pages/FollowupDetailsPage.t: Shows a paginated table of all leads with their status, name, contact, and notes, with navigation back to the lead summary page.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Lists all CRM leads in a card grid with search and status filtering, and supports adding, editing, and deleting leads via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LeadSummaryReportPage: Provides a searchable, filterable lead summary report table with row selection, bulk actions, and download controls.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements a two-step OTP login flow (email entry then OTP verification) using a backend actor, with localStorage-based auth state helpers and navigation to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/PipelinePage.tsx: Displays a sales pipeline view with a lead funnel, tags pie chart, and campaign list, fetching sample data via React Query hooks and providing navigation to lead summary and campaign creation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and allows editing of the authenticated user's profile (name, email, phone) with an OTP email verification dialog, and displays admin/approval status badges.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersPage.tsx: Manages a local list of reminders with search, overdue/upcoming filters, add/edit via a form dialog, and delete confirmation, displaying due dates and overdue indicators.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Placeholder page for a future Reports section, displaying a 'Coming Soon' message with a bar chart icon.
frontend/src/pages/SolarProjectDetailPag: Placeholder detail page for a solar project identified by URL param, showing a stub card and a back-navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/SolarProjectsPage.tsx: Lists solar projects stored in local state with search and status filtering, supporting add/edit via a form dialog and delete confirmation, displayed in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/pages/TemplatesPage.tsx: Placeholder page for a future Templates section (WhatsApp, SMS, email), displaying a 'Coming Soon' message with a file-text icon.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH variables, fonts, border radius, shadows, animations) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracker for a Motoko-backed CRM app (NIRMALA SOL), recording known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests such as sidebar visibility fixes, real backend data, and functional action buttons.
